languages.text: {n}Клоны почти синхронно обводят взглядом окружение, бесплотный голос отвечает вам.{/n} "Этим унылым сводам не хватает прагматизма и функциональности, но они сносно выполняли роль пристанища для моих исследований".

traits.locale_text: {n}Клоны почти синхронно обводят взглядом окружение, бесплотный голос отвечает вам.{/n} "Этим унылым сводам не хватает прагматизма и функциональности, но они сносно выполняли роль пристанища для моих исследований".
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."
languages.original_text: {n}Клоны почти синхронно обводят взглядом окружение, бесплотный голос отвечает вам.{/n} "Этим унылым сводам не хватает прагматизма и функциональности, но они сносно выполняли роль пристанища для моих исследований".

traits.locale_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}所有血伶人以几乎同样的动作环顾四周，发出了刺耳的声音。{/n}“这个沉闷的地下室的功能性与实用性都不怎么样，不过我暂时也只能留在这个避难所里，进行我的研究。”
languages.original_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."

traits.locale_text: {n}所有血伶人以几乎同样的动作环顾四周，发出了刺耳的声音。{/n}“这个沉闷的地下室的功能性与实用性都不怎么样，不过我暂时也只能留在这个避难所里，进行我的研究。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Die Klone sehen sich mit einer fast perfekt synchronisierten Bewegung um. Eine körperlose Stimme antwortet dir:{/n} "Diesem tristen Gewölbe fehlt es an Zweckmäßigkeit und Funktion, doch es ist eine passable Zuflucht für mich und meine Forschung."
languages.original_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Klone sehen sich mit einer fast perfekt synchronisierten Bewegung um. Eine körperlose Stimme antwortet dir:{/n} "Diesem tristen Gewölbe fehlt es an Zweckmäßigkeit und Funktion, doch es ist eine passable Zuflucht für mich und meine Forschung."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Los clones miran en derredor con un movimiento casi sincronizado. Una voz incorpórea te responde.{/n} «Esta deprimente estancia resulta tan poco práctica como disfuncional, pero ha servido adecuadamente como refugio para mi investigación y para mí mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los clones miran en derredor con un movimiento casi sincronizado. Una voz incorpórea te responde.{/n} «Esta deprimente estancia resulta tan poco práctica como disfuncional, pero ha servido adecuadamente como refugio para mi investigación y para mí mismo».
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Les clones regardent autour d'eux d'une façon presque synchronisée, puis une voix désincarnée vous répond :{/n} « Cette affreuse crypte n'est ni pratique ni fonctionnelle, mais elle fait office de refuge pour mes recherches et moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les clones regardent autour d'eux d'une façon presque synchronisée, puis une voix désincarnée vous répond :{/n} « Cette affreuse crypte n'est ni pratique ni fonctionnelle, mais elle fait office de refuge pour mes recherches et moi. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}クローンたちはほとんどシンクロした動きで周囲を見回す。実体のない声があなたに答える。{/n}「この殺風景な保管室は実用性や機能性に欠けるが、私と私の研究のための避難所としては及第点というところだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."

traits.locale_text: {n}クローンたちはほとんどシンクロした動きで周囲を見回す。実体のない声があなたに答える。{/n}「この殺風景な保管室は実用性や機能性に欠けるが、私と私の研究のための避難所としては及第点というところだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Klonlar, neredeyse senkronize bir hâlde etraflarına bakınıyor. Sorduğun soruyu gaipten bir ses yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Bu kasvetli mahzende pratiklik ve işlev eksikliği olsa da araştırmalarım için elverişli bir sığınak oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The clones look around them in a movement that is almost synchronised. A disembodied voice answers you:{/n} "This dreary vault is lacking in practicality and function but it has served as a passable refuge for me and my research."
